hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"A man asked the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) which deed is best. He said: 'Faith in Allah.' He said: 'Then what?' He said: 'Jihad in the cause of Allah.' He said: 'Then what?' He said: 'Hajjun Mabrur.'" [1] [1] Hajj, that is accepted, or free of sin

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَعْدِلُ الْجِهَادَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ .
chapter.eng-name: What Is Equal To Jihad In The Cause Of Allah, The Mighty And Sublime?
